title: Technical Onboarding Specialist
descriptionText:
Full-time ¬∑ Remote-first ¬∑ B2B SaaS (Developer & Data Tools)
Drive smooth and impactful customer onboarding for a fast-growing technical SaaS product. You‚Äôll help new users succeed from day one ‚Äî through smart onboarding flows, clear documentation, and personal support.
We‚Äôre supporting a remote-first SaaS company helping data and DevOps teams manage complex infrastructure more efficiently. The platform is used by 1000+ teams across 50+ countries ‚Äî and growing fast. With a distributed team of 60+ people, the company is now hiring an Onboarding Specialist to help new users get up and running faster.
This is a cross-functional role, ideal for someone who enjoys working at the intersection of customer success, product education, and technical enablement.
üéØ What You‚Äôll Be Working OnGuide new customers through the first 30‚Äì60 days on the platformSet up and improve onboarding journeys (incl. email sequences, in-app flows)Create and maintain technical guides, tutorials, and documentationProvide 1:1 support and Q&A sessions where neededCollaborate with Product, Support, and Growth to identify friction points and improve adoption
‚úÖ What They‚Äôre Looking For2+ years experience in customer onboarding, success, or support ‚Äî ideally for a SaaS or developer productSolid understanding of technical tools and ability to learn new systems quicklyStrong communicator with great structure and clarity in writingEmpathetic and proactive approach to helping customers succeedBased in EMEA and fluent in English
Bonus if you‚Äôve worked with onboarding automation (e.g., Intercom, Appcues) or have experience with technical documentation.
üåç SetupRemote-first team across EMEA and North America. You‚Äôll report to the Customer Success Lead and work closely with Product, Support, and Growth. Core working hours are CET ¬±2.
üìß How to ApplyApply via HiCareer and briefly share what excites you about this role.
------
Due to high interest, we may not reply to everyone individually ‚Äî but feel free to use our Career Assistant to evaluate the match. You can also explore more roles via HiCareer‚Äôs platform.
descriptionHtml:
Full-time ¬∑ Remote-first ¬∑ B2B SaaS (Developer & Data Tools)


Drive smooth and impactful customer onboarding for a fast-growing technical SaaS product. You‚Äôll help new users succeed from day one ‚Äî through smart onboarding flows, clear documentation, and personal support.


We‚Äôre supporting a remote-first SaaS company helping data and DevOps teams manage complex infrastructure more efficiently. The platform is used by 1000+ teams across 50+ countries ‚Äî and growing fast. With a distributed team of 60+ people, the company is now hiring an Onboarding Specialist to help new users get up and running faster.


This is a cross-functional role, ideal for someone who enjoys working at the intersection of customer success, product education, and technical enablement.


üéØ What You‚Äôll Be Working On

  • Guide new customers through the first 30‚Äì60 days on the platform
  • Set up and improve onboarding journeys (incl. email sequences, in-app flows)
  • Create and maintain technical guides, tutorials, and documentation
  • Provide 1:1 support and Q&A sessions where needed
  • Collaborate with Product, Support, and Growth to identify friction points and improve adoption

‚úÖ What They‚Äôre Looking For

  • 2+ years experience in customer onboarding, success, or support ‚Äî ideally for a SaaS or developer product
  • Solid understanding of technical tools and ability to learn new systems quickly
  • Strong communicator with great structure and clarity in writing
  • Empathetic and proactive approach to helping customers succeed
  • Based in EMEA and fluent in English

Bonus if you‚Äôve worked with onboarding automation (e.g., Intercom, Appcues) or have experience with technical documentation.


üåç Setup

Remote-first team across EMEA and North America. You‚Äôll report to the Customer Success Lead and work closely with Product, Support, and Growth. Core working hours are CET ¬±2.


üìß How to Apply

Apply via HiCareer and briefly share what excites you about this role.


------


Due to high interest, we may not reply to everyone individually ‚Äî but feel free to use our Career Assistant to evaluate the match. You can also explore more roles via HiCareer‚Äôs platform.

company.name: HiCareer
company.description:
HiCareer (prev. DoubleCloud) is a social career platform where you can interact with like-minded people as well as getting matched with career opportunities at some of Europe's most innovative growth brands.

We also offer companies expert-led services simplifying hiring for growing companies, ensuring you get top talent quickly.

Be part of the community today!
